did.unittitle: "Somewhere in Carolina" : a souvenir picture. Army Maneuvers of 1941 (Dietz Press, Richmond, Virginia, copyright W.R. Thompson & Company, Publishers, Richmond, Virginia) 1941

scopecontent.p: Depicts, planes, dirigibles, parachute drops, artillery, trucks, tanks, cavalry, motorcycle units, soldiers in column, and a camp, all being watched by an African-American farm family and field workers.

did.unittitle: Camp Lee, Virginia, 1941, Dietz Press, Richmond, Virginia, copyright W.R. Thompson & Company, Publishers, Richmond, Virginia 1941

scopecontent.p: Aerial view of the barracks with planes flying overhead in formation.
